[{"id":"dev-16123","entityId":"86-19515","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[Booking widget] No upcoming date available"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Yann Maurer"},{"name":"created","value":"1554729590703"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"16123"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://hirsch-sprung.regiondo.de/mtb-fahrtechniktraining-in-kirchzarten
Product ID70480
Account emailbjoern.fuenfgeld@hirsch-sprung.com

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Pick an offer with not much appointments in the future, e.g. https://hirsch-sprung.regiondo.de/mtb-fahrtechniktraining-in-kirchzarten
  2. go to future month

Actual result:

User clicks on next months hoping to find an appointment

November

December

etc.

Expected result:

Explain to the user that there are no more appointments bookable online

Copy

EN
Sorry, there is no online availability starting from June 2023.
Please call us at XXX.

FR
Désolé, il n'y a pas de disponibilité en ligne à partir de juin 2023.
Veuillez nous appeler au XXX.

DE
Es gibt leider keine Online-Verfügbarkeit ab Juni 2023.
Bitte rufen Sie uns an unter XXX.

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Maksym Hopei"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"y.maurer"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"6"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"m.hopei"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1582016093689"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"dev-14645","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"When is it needed ?","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Usability Problem"],"valueId":["Usability Problem"],"color":null},{"name":"State","value":["In Progress"],"valueId":["In Progress"],"color":{"bg":"#0070e4","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Reproducible","value":["Yes"],"valueId":["Yes"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"m.hopei","fullName":"Maksym Hopei"}]},{"name":"Spent time","value":["42"],"valueId":["42m"],"color":null},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"First sprint","id":"Team Zulu:First sprint"}]},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"image.png","id":"89-55825","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/image.png?file=89-55825&c=true"},{"value":"image1.png","id":"89-55826","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/image1.png?file=89-55826&c=true"},{"value":"image2.png","id":"89-55827","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/image2.png?file=89-55827&c=true"},{"value":"16123 No Upcoming Date Available V05.png","id":"89-59846","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/16123%20No%20Upcoming%20Date%20Available%20V05.png?file=89-59846&c=true"},{"value":"16123 [Booking widget] No upcoming date available.sketch","id":"89-59847","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/16123%20%5BBooking%20widget%5D%20No%20upcoming%20date%20available.sketch?file=89-59847&c=true"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"88-60004","author":"a.bugaichuk","authorFullName":"Andrii Bugaichuk","issueId":"dev-16123","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Yann Maurer

  1. For me text "Sorry, there is no online availability for June 2023." does not correspond to the requirement "there are no more appointments bookable online". The word "for" in the message means exactely the same that empty calendar for the current month and gives no additional information about the future availability. Probably we should use something like "Sorry, there is no online availability starting from June 2023."
  2. Should we fix the behavior when "Time" line and quantity selector remain when customer switches to month without any appointment?
  3. How to open 16123 [Booking widget] No upcoming date available (1).sketch attachment?

P.S. For such cases we should suggest to client to not use calendar representation but drop-down or disable possibility to select it on preview phase with some explanation.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1563353290218,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-60009","author":"g.horvath","authorFullName":"György Horváth","issueId":"dev-16123","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Andrii Bugaichuk
1.) Agree, if we don't have any appointment later.
2.) I would agree, it would look better, but I think it's unnecessary dev cost. Our users probably won't get to see it. As they would stop reading/looking at the phone number.
3.) Open the png file or download the app here: https://www.sketch.com/. Or please use the following. Text= Roboto, 19, Bold. Border size = size of the calendar. Border color: color of past days.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1563355697224,"updated":1563355936904,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-60059","author":"y.maurer","authorFullName":"Yann Maurer","issueId":"dev-16123","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Andrii Bugaichuk
The reality is that often supplier pre-fill appointments for a longer period of time (eventually 12 months) but forget to populate new availbilites when the end of the season approaches, so suggesting a drop-down would not help

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1563382138879,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-65292","author":"sergey.chorny","authorFullName":"Sergey Chorny","issueId":"dev-16123","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Maksym Hopei
Please take a look if it is possible to return me last available appoinment date.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1580222974421,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-65502","author":"m.hopei","authorFullName":"Maksym Hopei","issueId":"dev-16123","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Sergey Chorny, you can find first and last available appointment date in the 'range_available' item in the calendar data.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1580977772878,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-65827","author":"sergey.chorny","authorFullName":"Sergey Chorny","issueId":"dev-16123","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Maksym Hopei
Check please code, it returns null instead of dates in range.

@Alexander Bechte
I've done what is requested in this ticket, however it is technically difficult to follow this design, and show text over calendar. Also, as we have multiple calendars, I see only option to show this text below calendar. Once Maxim fix his part, check please on testing, and provide feedbacks.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1582015415328,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"dev-17227","entityId":"86-22737","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[gift voucher redemption] decline of booking request for invisible price lists not possible"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Stefan Seitz"},{"name":"created","value":"1580740777805"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17227"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://www.regiondo.com/resellers/account/bookingsview/key/
Product ID106594
Account emailiris.gligorea@regiondo.com
Supplier ID23776
Order #1980837026
Novomind Ticket ID79604



#### Steps to reproduce:
1. https://itsoftwaresibiu.regiondo.com/categories > Offer "Optional: Ticketshop title" > buy 1 ticket as gift for variation "2nd price list", option "asdadfafa" > complete purchase
2. Login > manage offers > my offers > product 106594 > Step 3 > set option "asdadfafa" to invisible > save and publish
3. https://itsoftwaresibiu.regiondo.com/voucher > redeem voucher for any date > request date
4. bookings > bookings > check booking for redeemed gift voucher


#### Actual result:

only "apply changes" button appears, clickng this button is followed by no action
no possibility to decline booking




#### Expected result:

1- When ticketcategory is set as invisible, do not allow customer to redeem his voucher
2- No date and time should be proposed
3 - Display notification

EN : The booked ticket category is no longuer availabe, please contact [Supplier_phone number] to schedule a new appoitment
DE : Die gebuchte Ticket-Kategorie ist nicht länger verfügbar, bitte kontaktieren Sie [Supplier_phone number ], um einen neuen Termin zu vereinbaren.
FR: La catégorie de billet réservée n'est plus disponible, veuillez contacter [Supplier_phone number] pour fixer une nouvelle date de réservation
IT : La categoria di biglietto prenotato non è disponibile per un lungo periodo, si prega di contattare [Supplier_phone number] per fissare un nuovo appuntamento
ES: La categoría de boletos reservados no está disponible, por favor contacte al [Supplier_phone number] para programar un nuevo nombramiento.

Development - Regiondo Projectboard.pdf","id":"89-66603","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/Bugs%20%2316580_%20Booking%20which%20are%20manually%20accepted%20are%20not%20concidered%20in%20Calendar%20-%20Development%20-%20Regiondo%20Projectboard.pdf?file=89-66603&c=true"},{"value":"image2.png","id":"89-66608","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/image2.png?file=89-66608&c=true"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"88-65661","author":"m.hopei","authorFullName":"Maksym Hopei","issueId":"dev-17227","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Walid Dechri, this all looks like intentional behaviour. You mentioned that this “Apply changes” functionality must not be there, but the only case when it is there is when the redeemed option is not visible or doesn't exist anymore. Please suggest how to proceed.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1581497759869,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-65816","author":"walid.dechri","authorFullName":"Walid Dechri","issueId":"dev-17227","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Maksym Hopei Could you please tell me what action is done when I click to apply change button ? because now there is no action
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1581957436747,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-65818","author":"m.hopei","authorFullName":"Maksym Hopei","issueId":"dev-17227","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Walid Dechri, normally this function suggests you alternative options for the ones that are not available anymore. You can select them and then something similar to alter booking should happen. See the screenshot in attached export of the old ticket from Redmine. I never tried this functionality my myself. This is is just my guess of how it works.
In this particular case it has no sense of course. You can try to add an available option next to the invisible one, so the alternative is shown here. I think there it will work.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1581966803757,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-65825","author":"walid.dechri","authorFullName":"Walid Dechri","issueId":"dev-17227","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Maksym Hopei I Updated the ticket and provided new expected result.

URLhttps://www.regiondo.com/resellers/account/bookings
Product ID26734
Account emailinfo@ice-mountain.com
Supplier ID11329
Novomind Ticket ID53773
EnvironmentWindows 10, Version 76.0.3809.132 (Official Build) (64-bit)

Steps to reproduce:

  1. login to info@ice-mountain.com and go to Dashboard » Bookings »Booking overview
  2. Search the name: "passemier"
  3. Click on any Reservation with this name

Actual result:

504 gateway time-out

Expected result:

Reservation should open in order to be modified or confirmed

URLhttps://www.regiondo.de/resellers/account/availabilities
Product ID23612
Product ID24639
Account emailinfo@driving-area.de
Supplier ID11542
EnvironmentWindows 10, Chrome Version 60.0.3112.90 (Offizieller Build) (64-Bit)

What steps will reproduce the problem?
A)
https://www.regiondo.de/resellers/account/availabilities>date 02/09> check availability (6/7)>only 5 participants are shown (Atts. 96,97)

B)
https://www.regiondo.de/resellers/account/availabilities>date 22/09 Offer:"VIP - Schräglagen-Training - BMW Block am Ring"> check availability (2/5)>has to be shown as (1/1/5) because one participant has been cancelled (Att. 98,99)

What is the expected result?

availabilities should be shown correctly in calendar

A) 5/7

B)
1/1/5

What happens instead?

wrong availabilities shown

For Case A) originally the capacity was 6, therefore shown as sold out in frontend. because of that, capacity was manually changed to 7.

URLhttps://www.regiondo.com/resellers/account/availabilities
Product ID23432
Account emailinfo@driving-area.de
Supplier ID11542
EnvironmentWindows 7, Firefox 54.0 (32-Bit)

1. Go to https://www.regiondo.com/resellers/account/availabilities
2. search for Date 09.09.2017
3. Overview is showing 7/7
4. Click on view participants
5. You only have 5 confirmed bookings and 2 canceled bookings

What is expected:
To get the right overview (5/2/7)

What happen instead:
The overview is shown 7/7

Further more for one participant is missing infos like (Email, Name, Telephone, bookingnummer)

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1581672530451,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"dev-17192","entityId":"86-22660","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[POS][API] Social login with facebook and google"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Viktoriia Karenko"},{"name":"created","value":"1579785912463"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17192"},{"name":"description","value":"

Please add possibility to login with google and facebook with new oAuth2.0.
If reseller for current email doesn't exist please return an error "Unfortunately we cannot find a Regiondo account for this email address".

Input data:

access_token=facebook/google_access_token
scope=reseller-data,
grant_type=social_login,
client_id=POS,
client_secret=client_secret

Output data:

Same as we have for normal login

[{"id":"dev-17227","entityId":"86-22737","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[gift voucher redemption] decline of booking request for invisible price lists not possible"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Stefan Seitz"},{"name":"created","value":"1580740777805"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17227"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://www.regiondo.com/resellers/account/bookingsview/key/
Product ID106594
Account emailiris.gligorea@regiondo.com
Supplier ID23776
Order #1980837026
Novomind Ticket ID79604



#### Steps to reproduce:
1. https://itsoftwaresibiu.regiondo.com/categories > Offer "Optional: Ticketshop title" > buy 1 ticket as gift for variation "2nd price list", option "asdadfafa" > complete purchase
2. Login > manage offers > my offers > product 106594 > Step 3 > set option "asdadfafa" to invisible > save and publish
3. https://itsoftwaresibiu.regiondo.com/voucher > redeem voucher for any date > request date
4. bookings > bookings > check booking for redeemed gift voucher


#### Actual result:

only "apply changes" button appears, clickng this button is followed by no action
no possibility to decline booking




#### Expected result:

Same as in https://track.regiondo.com/issue/dev-16595

When customer redeems gift certificate for an offer with invisible price list, supplier should have the same booking details template like offer with manual confirmation in order to let supplier decide if he accepts or declines the request.

When supplier declines the request, only value voucher should be proposed as refund method.

Refund should be done to the attendee not to the buyer

After refund system should send email template 58 to attendee
"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Maksym Hopei"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"stefan.seitz"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"1"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"m.hopei"},{"name":"markdown","value":"false"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1581497764709"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"dev-16595","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"}]},{"name":"When is it needed ?","value":["Major"],"valueId":["Major"],"color":{"bg":"#ffee9c","fg":"#b45f06"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"State","value":["Feedback"],"valueId":["Feedback"],"color":{"bg":"#ff7123","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Reproducible","value":["Yes"],"valueId":["Yes"],"color":null},{"name":"Account Segment","value":["All"],"valueId":["All"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"m.hopei","fullName":"Maksym Hopei"}]},{"name":"Score","value":["32"],"valueId":["32"],"color":null},{"name":"Impact on loss of revenue","value":["6"],"valueId":["6"],"color":null},{"name":"Impact on daily business","value":["8"],"valueId":["8"],"color":null},{"name":"Impact on end customer experience","value":["8"],"valueId":["8"],"color":null},{"name":"Impact on legal or financial","value":["10"],"valueId":["10"],"color":null},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"First sprint","id":"Team Zulu:First sprint"}]},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"image.png","id":"89-66145","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/image.png?file=89-66145&c=true"},{"value":"image1.png","id":"89-66146","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/image1.png?file=89-66146&c=true"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"88-65661","author":"m.hopei","authorFullName":"Maksym Hopei","issueId":"dev-17227","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Walid Dechri, this all looks like intentional behaviour. You mentioned that this “Apply changes” functionality must not be there, but the only case when it is there is when the redeemed option is not visible or doesn't exist anymore. Please suggest how to proceed.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1581497759869,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"dev-17192","entityId":"86-22660","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[POS][API] Social login with facebook and google"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Viktoriia Karenko"},{"name":"created","value":"1579785912463"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17192"},{"name":"description","value":"

Please add possibility to login with google and facebook with new oAuth2.0.
If reseller for current email doesn't exist please return an error "Unfortunately we cannot find a Regiondo account for this email address".

Input data:

access_token=facebook/google_access_token
scope=reseller-data,
grant_type=social_login,
client_id=POS,
client_secret=client_secret

Output data:

Same as we have for normal login
